system.description: Your size increases by one category (e.g. Medium to Large), and you gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, and a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor. Your speed increases by 10 feet. If your new form is Large or larger, you gain damage reduction 3/evil (or 3/good if you are evil). Your unarmed damage and reach change as appropriate for your new size. Your existing weapons and armor grow with you; armor and clothing that do not fit your new size burst. The spell does not change your ability scores other than Strength and Constitution.
